header.layout: flex justify-between items-center px-10 py-6 bg-surface sticky top-0 z-50

heroSection.layout: flex flex-row flex-wrap items-center justify-between px-10 py-16 gap-8 md:flex-col
heroSection.title: Sanat eserlerine hayat verin
heroSection.subtitle: Bir tablo adı yazın, AI sizin için hikayesini anlatsın.

cta.style: px-6 py-3 rounded-button bg-gradient-to-r from-[#ff4e00] to-[#ec9f05] text-black font-semibold

searchBar.style: w-full max-w-2xl px-5 py-4 rounded-lg bg-surface text-white focus:outline-none border border-gray-700

artworkGrid.layout: grid grid-cols-3 gap-8 px-10 py-8 md:grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-1
artworkGrid.cardStyle: bg-surface p-5 rounded-card shadow-card hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-200

footer.layout: grid grid-cols-3 gap-6 px-10 py-8 border-t border-gray-700 text-muted text-sm bg-surface sm:grid-cols-1

responsive.scaling: grid and flex utilities with responsive typography

_note: Although this design follows mobile-first conventions, this project should be designed desktop-first by default.
